resources.string: Say HEY ESRA to wake me up
Say STOP or tap anywhere to stop the action
Hi there! How are you feeling? Nervous or happy?
Let\'s do a happy dance, whoop whoop!
Let\'s do a sexy dance, you sexy beast!
Do you want to listen to: Walking on Sunshine? or: Sexy and I know it?
Let\'s do some box breathing. How long do you want to go? Short? Medium? Long
